data.eml:eml: New species of the genus Phaonia R. - D., 1830 (Diptera, Muscidae) from Central Asia

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Sorokina, Vera S. (2015): New species of the genus Phaonia R. - D., 1830 (Diptera, Muscidae) from Central Asia. Zootaxa 4013 (4): 571-587, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4013.4.7
